description: Barbecue pork and noodle stir-fry on the table in 20 minutes? This char siu and noodle recipe is so quick and easy, you'll add it to your favourites.
name: Quick Char Siu & Noodle Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 560 g Woolworths COOK slow cooked Chinese BBQ style pork with char siu sauce
425 g Birds Eye Stir Fry Mix Chinese

recipeInstructions.text: Add noodle and pork mixtures to pan. Stir-fry over medium-low heat for 3 minutes or until well combined and heated through. Divide mixture among bowls. Serve sprinkled with sesame seeds.
